name: Alex Rodriguez
summary:
Experienced engineering manager with 10+ years in software development and team leadership.
Expertise in scaling engineering teams, architecting distributed systems, and driving technical
innovation in fast-paced environments.

description: Manage engineering team of 25+ developers across 4 product areas
Architected migration to microservices reducing system latency by 50%

Collaborated with product and design teams to deliver customer-centric solutions
Designed and implemented high-availability systems serving 5M+ users
Led technical interviews and mentored junior developers
Optimized database performance improving query response time by 70%
